rules_text:
If a creature would leave the battlefield, instead exile it and put a charge counter on Soul Devouring Core.
{3}{W}: Soul Devouring Core becomes an X/X Spirit Avatar that is all colors until end of turn, where X is the number of charge counters on it.
flavor_text: [i]A parting gift one thousand years old. Not a soul dares to risk the alternatives.[/i]
